trans-unit.source: Represents a fault that can have an associated HTTP status code.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma falha que pode ter um código de status HTTP associado.

trans-unit.source: When using a WCF REST endpoint (<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior>) the HTTP status code on the response is set accordingly.
trans-unit.target: Ao usar um ponto de extremidade do WCF REST (<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior>) o código de status HTTP na resposta será definido adequadamente.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: However, WebFaultException can be used with non-REST endpoints and behaves like a regular <xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, WebFaultException pode ser usado com pontos de extremidade REST não e se comporta como uma <xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException>

trans-unit.source: When using a WCF REST endpoint, the response format of the serialized fault is determined in the same way as a non-fault response.
trans-unit.target: Ao usar um ponto de extremidade do WCF REST, o formato da resposta da falha de serializado é determinado da mesma forma como uma resposta não falha.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] WCF REST formatting, see [WCF Web HTTP Formatting](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]WCF REST formatação, consulte [formatação do WCF Web HTTP](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebFaultException"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebFaultException"> </xref> classe com o <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.</xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode> especificado

trans-unit.source: The HTTP status code to return to the caller.
trans-unit.target: O código de status HTTP para retornar ao chamador.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebFaultException"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebFaultException"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData*> method that is called when an object is serialized to a stream.
trans-unit.target: Uma implementação de <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData*>método é chamado quando um objeto é serializado em um fluxo.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData*>

trans-unit.source: The serialization information to which the object data is added when serialized.
trans-unit.target: As informações de serialização para o qual os dados do objeto são adicionados quando serializado.

trans-unit.source: The destination for the serialized object.
trans-unit.target: O destino para o objeto serializado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode> associated with the fault.
The HTTP status code associated with the fault.
trans-unit.target: O código de status HTTP associado à falha.
